#ml #data scientist

About company

We build a cross-chain liquid staking protocol built as an Integrated Application on the Neutron blockchain. Integrated Applications are smart(er) contracts that have the powers of appchains‚Äînative automation, arbitrary cross-chain interoperability, MEV recapture, custom fees and mempools, and more‚Äîin the form factor of a smart contract.

About Role

As a Data Analyst on our protocol, you will be creating key dashboards, conducting research related to DeFi, and generating insights that influence strategic decisions. This role is perfect for those who are passionate about solving complex problems and are eager to shape the future of decentralized finance.

What we offer

- Payment in USD (5k monthly)
- Large token allocation
- Remote work options
- Opportunities for international travel
- 28 Voluntary paid day-off per annum
- Comprehensive benefit package including:
- Physical Well-being program,
- Mental Health program,
- Individual Training & Conference Attendance program,
- English studies program,
- Co-working space reimbursement

Responsibilities

- Develop and maintain dashboards that provide clear visibility into the operations of the protocol
- Prepare regular reports detailing the activities and status of the protocol, including analysis of trends and operational metrics to aid in strategic decision-making
- Conduct research related to decentralized finance (DeFi), investigating new trends, technologies, and opportunities within the industry that could impact or enhance the functionality of the protocol
- Collaborate with technical team to refine and optimize the presentation of data on dashboards, enhancing user experience and data accessibility
- Analyze and interpret complex data sets related to protocol operations, providing insights that contribute to the continuous improvement of the protocol's efficiency

Qualifications

- 3+ years of practical experience in data analysis and statistical modeling techniques
- Excellent knowledge of data science methodologies for data analysis, understanding of data types, themes, scientific challenges, and approaches, including statistical analytics
- Proficiency in using data sources and applications for research purposes
- Experience in cryptocurrencies, particularly with Cosmos, is highly advantageous
- Advanced SQL skills
- English B2+

For applying please send your CV to https://t.me/frolovadaria

@ml_data_science_job

#ml #data scientist

Company: LLM Startup for Enterprise
Level: Lead/Senior LLM Engineer
Salary range: 6-8k$ net
City: Armenia, Erevan or Remote
HR contact: @seda_hakobyan


üëâAt our company, our mission goes beyond typical solutions; we delve deep into the nuances of business problems to create end-to-end (E2E) automation specifically tailored for the legal and financial sectors. Partnering with Fortune 500 companies, we've tested numerous hypotheses and now focus on leveraging domain-specific knowledge along with advanced LLM and Agent technologies. Our projects include refining document analysis systems to enhance operational efficiency and developing AI assistants that identify and correct errors in financial documents. Our goal is not to create a one-size-fits-all AI copilot, but to develop targeted solutions that accumulate expertise and reusable components within our platform.


What You'll Do:
‚úîÔ∏èDevelop Specialized Solutions: Design, build, and deploy LLM-based solutions for diverse applications, including question-answering systems, search engines, content generation, and task-solving Agents
‚úîÔ∏èEnhance and Innovate: Keep our tech at the cutting edge by integrating the latest in LLM models, frameworks, and libraries
‚úîÔ∏èCollaborate on R&D: Work in a dynamic R&D team to explore new ideas and collaborate with cross-functional teams to make sure our products lead the market.
‚úîÔ∏èLead with Expertise: Use your deep AI knowledge to guide our team and partners in building even better solutions.


Who You Are:
‚úîÔ∏èPractical LLM engineer : You have a background in NLP/LLM technologies (e.g., GPT-3/4, Llama, BERT etc) and are skilled in NLP frameworks (Hugging Face Transformers, PyTorch). 
‚úîÔ∏èExperience with LLM tools for pipelines - LangChain (Semantic Kernel, Haystack or LiteLLM) and advanced RAG pipelines (LlamaIndex)
‚úîÔ∏èSolid developer: You‚Äôre great at Python3 and solving complex issues with algorithms and software design patterns. Familiar with best practices in software development, including version control, testing, and continuous integration
‚úîÔ∏èAI Enthusiast: You're driven by challenges and excited about using AI to transform different industries.


Bonus Points if You Have:
‚úîÔ∏èMastery in crafting diverse prompts to tackle a variety of challenges effectively.
‚úîÔ∏èProven track record in technical public relations, such as winning competitions or hackathons, and contributing to open-source LLM/NLP projects on platforms like GitHub.
‚úîÔ∏èPrevious involvement in early-stage startups, participation in accelerators, or experience in launching and managing your own startup ventures.

–ü–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–µ–µ: https://telegra.ph/Data-scientistML-engineer-Rekomendatelnaya-sistema-05-27

#ml #data scientist

#DataScientist #Senior #Middle+ #relocation #remote 
 
We are expanding our DS team and are looking for a talented Senior Data Scientist to join our international team and take part in groundbreaking projects that define the blockchain industry. Clain is building sophisticated analysis software that provides regulatory compliance for crypto related businesses and empowers forensic investigators with ingenious tools to detect and explore crypto-enabled crimes. We offer an ideal workplace for those who want to have a real impact on the growth of an organization and are craving responsibilities.  
  
What we offer:  
- A chance to work with cool crypto compliance products and make a real impact on the business  
- Powerful server hardware (from 32 CPUs and 256Gb RAM) for work and experiments  
- Petabytes of on-chain data and gigabytes of off-chain data: tabular data, json, texts and even pictures  
- Relocation to Cyprus (Limassol) with employment and social guarantees in accordance with Cypriot law  
- Flexible start of the working day and optionally hybrid working week  
- Collaborative and supportive team atmosphere  
  
Key Responsibilities:  
- Analysis of on-chain and off-chain data  
- Creation and automation of analytical services and ML models  
- Participation in the creation of the DS ecosystem  
  
Requirements:  
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to extract insights from large datasets and effectively visualize data  
- Proven work experience of at least 3 years in a similar role  
- Knowledge of development principles: OOP, SOLID  
- Practical experience of Python 3, packages: numpy, pandas, pydantic  
- Good level of SQL  
- Familiar with one of: shell/bash/powershell  
- Bachelor's degree in statistics, applied mathematics, or related discipline  
- Intermediate English for communication in the international team 
  
It will be a plus:  
- Familiar with the principles of Blockchain technology  
- Professional level of Python 3 (type hints, logging, profiling, and code modularity)  
- Experience with columnar/graph/document-oriented DBs  
- Experience with Docker, k8s, AirFlow  
  
If you're driven by innovation, passionate about blockchain, and ready to embrace the challenges of shaping the future, we want to hear from you!  
   
Contact us:  
 Elena, Talent acquisition manager - tg @elena_yank

–§–æ–∫—É—Å–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏: –º–∞–Ω–∏–ø—É–ª—è—Ü–∏—è, —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ª–æ–≥–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏, –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –∞–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ø–æ–º–æ—Ä—Ñ–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç—ã.

–ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä—ã –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏ –¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞ —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω–æ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—Ç –Ω–∞ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–µ–≤—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏—è—Ö, –∞ –∏—Ö —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å–∏ –ø—É–±–ª–∏–∫—É—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω—ã—Ö –∂—É—Ä–Ω–∞–ª–∞—Ö.

–°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä—è–µ—Ç —à—Ç–∞—Ç –ø–æ –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ-—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è–º, –≤–æ—Ç –Ω–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –∏–∑ –Ω–∏—Ö:
